name: Visit Madeira
summary: Have you ever been in Madeira? Did you ever saw the beauty that this island can offer? Now you got an opportunity to fast travel there, just by putting your headset on.   Immerse yourself into 360 3D videos of the nicest locations on the island. Let your headset take you there in full 360 3D with spatial audio. Let yourself feel the heights of the cliffs, the beauty of the hills and forests. Relax on a beach or visit Funchal .   Your next holiday is just a point and click away!
